addAllowedAsset(address,address,uint256).details: function addAllowedAsset(address, address, uint256)Add an asset to the allowed assets list.

params._feePercentage: The fee percentage for the asset.
params.asset: The address of the asset to be added.
params.funder: The address of the intiall balancefunder.

fundContractWithEth().details: function fundContractWithEth()Funds the contract with ETH.

getAllowedAssets().details: function getAllowedAssets() gets the list of allowed assets.

returns._0: address[] Returns an array of addresses of allowed assets.

getAssetFeePercentage(address).details: function getAssetFeePercentage(address) gets the fee percentage of an asset.

params.asset: The address of the asset to be checked.

returns._0: uint256 Returns the fee percentage of the asset.

getAssetInfo(address).details: function getAssetInfo(address) gets the info of an asset.

params.asset: The address of the asset to be checked.

returns._0: AssetInfo Returns the info of the asset.

getAssetRevenue(address).details: function getAssetRevenue(address) gets the revenue of an asset.

params.asset: The address of the asset to be checked.

returns._0: uint256 Returns the revenue of the asset.

isAssetAllowed(address).details: function isAssetAllowed(address) checks if an asset is allowed.

params.asset: The address of the asset to be checked.

returns._0: bool Returns true if the asset is allowed, false otherwise.

offRampDeposit(address,uint256,address,u.details: function offRampDeposit(address, uint256, address, OnrampMedium, Region, bytes)Deposit function for the Ramp protocol.

params.amount: The amount of the asset to be deposited.
params.asset: The address of the asset to be deposited.

offRampNative(uint8,uint8,bytes).details: function offRampNative(OnrampMedium, Region, bytes)Deposits Native token.

offRampWithPermit(address,uint256,addres.details: function offRampWithPermit(address, uint256, address, OnrampMedium, Region, bytes)Deposit  for ERC20 tokens.

params.amount: The amount of the asset to be deposited.
params.asset: The address of the asset to be deposited.

onRampNative(address,uint256).details: function onRampNative(address payable receiver, uint256 amount)Withdraws native tokens from the contract.

params.amount: The amount of native tokens to be withdrawn.

onRampWithdraw(address,uint256,address).details: function onRampWithdraw(address, uint256, address)Withdraw function for the Ramp protocol.

params.amount: The amount of the asset to be withdrawn.
params.asset: The address of the asset to be withdrawn.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Pause function. This function is used to pause the contract, preventing any state changes. Only the Controller can call this function.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

removeAllowedAsset(address,address).details: function removeAllowedAsset(address, address)Remove an asset from the allowed assets list.

params.asset: The address of the asset to be removed.
params.balanceRecipient: The address of the recipient of the asset balance.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setNewFeePercentage(address,uint256).details: function setNewFeePercentage(address, uint256)sets a new fee percentage for an asset.

setNewVault(address).details: function setNewVault(address payable) sets a new vault address.

params._vault: The address of the new vault.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Unpause function. This function is used to unpause the contract, allowing state changes again. Only the Controller can call this function.

withdraAssetRevenue(address).details: function withdraAssetRevenue(address) withdraws asset revenue from the contract.

params.asset: The address of the asset to be withdrawn.

withdrawEtherRevenue(uint256).details: function withdrawEtherRevenue(uint256 amount) withdraws Ether from the contract.

params.amount: The amount of Ether to be withdrawn.

addAllowedAsset(address,address,uint256).notice: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.This function also transfers funds to the contractThis function emits the AssetAllowedAdded event to indicate that the asset has been added.

fundContractWithEth().notice: msg.value is the amount of ETH to be sent to the contract.This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.This function emits the EthReceived event to indicate that the ETH has been received.

offRampDeposit(address,uint256,address,u.notice: This function can only be called when the contract is not paused.This function transfers the amount of the asset from the sender to the contract.This function emits the RampDeposit event to indicate that the asset amount has been deposited from the user to the contract.

offRampNative(uint8,uint8,bytes).notice: this function is payable. The amount of the asset is the amount of the native token sent.This function can only be called when the contract is not paused.This function transfers the amount of the asset from the sender to the contract.This function emits the RampDeposit event to indicate that the asset amount has been deposited from the user to the contract.

offRampWithPermit(address,uint256,addres.notice: This function can only be called when the contract is not paused.This function transfers the amount of the asset from the sender to the contract.This function emits the RampDeposit event to indicate that the asset amount has been deposited from the user to the contract.

onRampNative(address,uint256).notice: This function can only be called by the owner when the contract is not paused.This function transfers the amount of native tokens from the contract to the receiver.This function emits the RampWithdraw event to indicate that the native tokens amount has been sent to the user.This function does not update the revenue per asset for the asset since this gets computed offchain.

onRampWithdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: This function can only be called when the contract is not paused.This function transfers the amount of the asset from the contract to the recipient.This function emits the RampWithdraw event to indicate that the asset  amount has been sent to the user.This function does not update the revenue per asset for the asset since this gets computed offchain.

removeAllowedAsset(address,address).notice: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.This function transfers the balance of the asset to the balanceRecipient.This function emits the AssetAllowedRemoved event to indicate that the asset has been removed.

setNewFeePercentage(address,uint256).notice: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.

setNewVault(address).notice: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.

withdraAssetRevenue(address).notice: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.This function transfers the amount of the asset from the contract to the vault.This function emits the AssetRevenueWithdrawn event to indicate that the asset balance in  the contract has been withdrawn.

withdrawEtherRevenue(uint256).notice: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.This function transfers the amount of Ether from the contract to the vault.This function emits the EthWithdrawn event to indicate that the eth balance in  the contract has been withdrawn.

documentation.text: @dev State Variables
@dev Initializes the contract.

@dev receive function to receive Ether.
 This function is used to receive Ether sent to the contract.
